DOC.brief_summary: Cohort study use data Clinical Practice Research Datalink ( CPRD ) . The study cohort include patient receive least one prescription ticagrelor first time December 2010 March 2015 , follow ACS . Patient baseline characteristic describe : ( Age , Gender , Body Mass Index , Smoking status , Sociodemographic status ) , type ACS intervention , CV history comorbidities , bleed respiratory history . The following outcome examine : Incidence vascular event ( composite MI , Stroke , vascular death , specific vascular event cause death ) , incidence bleed incidence dysponea . Time event vascular event , bleed dyspnoea .
DOC.brief_title: Outcomes UK ACS Patients Prescribed Ticagrelor
DOC.criteria: First prescription ( index date ) ticagrelor Dec 2010 Mar 2015 At least 12 month history database prior first ticagrelor prescription Linkage Hospital Episode Statistics ( HES ) Acute Coronary Syndrome ( ACS ) event three month prior include index date Primary care prescription clopidogrel prasugrel ACS date index date
